<e0>Terminology management</e0>: Terminology management is important for translation consistency. OmegaT uses glossaries containing translations of single words or small phrases: a simplified bilingual dictionary for a specific domain. For your reference, OmegaT displays the translation of any word that is both present in the segment and registered in the glossary.
<e0>术语管理</e0>：术语管理对于译文的一致性至关重要。OmegaT 的术语表包含单词或短语的翻译，即，术语表就是特定领域中的简易双语词典。当前句段中的单词如果存在于术语表中，OmegaT 就会显示出这个单词的译文，以供翻译参考。

<e0>The user interface</e0>,<e1>Main Menu and Keyboard Shortcuts</e1>: these two chapters are likely to be heavily consulted, since they explain the user interface of OmegaT and the functions available via the main menu and the keyboard shortcuts.
<e0>用户界面</e0>、<e1>主菜单和键盘快捷键</e1>：使用过程中主要查询的为这两章，其中介绍了 OmegaT 的用户界面，以及通过主菜单和键盘快捷键可调用的功能。
<e0>Translate the following attributes</e0>: the selected attributes will appear as segments in the Editor window.
<e0>翻译下列属性</e0>：已选择的属性会作为片段出现在编辑器窗口中。
<e0>Translation memories: </e0> explains the role of the various subfolders containing translation memories, and provides information on other important aspects relating to translation memories.
<e0>译法记忆：</e0> 本章介绍了包含译法记忆的各个子目录的作用，阐述了与译法记忆相关的其他重要信息。

<e0>Translation memory:</e0><a1> OmegaT</a1> stores your translations in a translation memory file. At the same time, it can use memories files from previous translations for reference. Translation memories can be very useful in a translation where there are numerous repetitions or reasonably similar segments of text. OmegaT uses translation memories to store your previous translations and then suggest likely translations for the text you are currently working on.
<e0>译法记忆：</e0><a1> OmegaT</a1>将译文存储在译法记忆文件中。同时，OmegaT可以使用此前翻译的译法记忆文件作为翻译参考。如果译文中存在大量重复，或相似的句段，译法记忆文件可以有效提高效率。OmegaT 使用译法记忆文件存储完成的翻译，然后根据您当前翻译的文本，给您提供相似的译文作为参考。

<e0>Translation process:</e0> Imagine having to translate something; from a single file to a folder containing subfolders each with a number of files in a variety of formats. When you let OmegaT know the files that you need to translate, it looks for the files it understands based on file filtering rules, recognizes the textual parts within them, splits up the text groups according to the segmentation rules, and displays the segments one by one so that you can proceed with the translation. OmegaT stores your translations and proposes possible translations from similar segments registered in the translation memory files. When you are ready to view the final product, you can export the translated files, open them in the appropriate application and view the translation in the final format...

<e0>翻译处理：</e0>设想您需要进行翻译，需要翻译的可能是单个文件，也可能是一个文件夹，其中包含子文件夹以及许多种不同格式的文件。您可以通过设置选择需要翻译的文件，OmegaT可以通过文件过滤规则对文件进行查找，辨认文件中的文本部分，根据片段分割规则对文本进行分割，然后在编辑器中显示出待翻译的片段以供翻译。OmegaT 保存译文，并根据译法记忆文件中已有的相似片段给出可能的译文，以供参考。如果您需要查看最终翻译成果，您可以导出已译文件，在相应的应用程序中打开，查看导出为最终格式的译文...
<e0>Warning!</e0> Should you change filter options whilst a project is open, you must reload the project in order for the changes to take effect.
<e0>警告！</e0>如果您在项目打开的时候改变过滤器选项，您必须重新载入项目以使改变生效。
<e0>Word:</e0> non-visible instruction text, comments, footnotes, endnotes, footers
<e0>Word：</e0>不可见说明文本、注释、脚注、尾注、页脚

<e0>使用纯文本</e0>和<e1>使用格式文本</e1>： 这两章节介绍了有关待翻译文本的重要事项，如编码集（纯文本文件）和标签处理（格式文本）。

Apertium uses a shallow-transfer machine translation engine which processes the input text in stages, as in an assembly line: de-formatting, morphological analysis, part-of-speech disambiguation, shallow structural transfer, lexical transfer, morphological generation, and re-formatting.
Apertium 使用浅层传播机器翻译引擎（shallow-transfer machine translation engine ）来处理输入的文本，就像汇编行：去除格式，形态分析，语音消歧，浅层结构传播，词汇传播，形态生成以及重新格式化。

Note: All of the segmentation rule sets with a matching Language Pattern are applied in the given order. Thus, for example, rules for Canadian French (FR-CA) should be higher than rules for French (FR.*), and higher than Default (.*) ones. Then while translating from Canadian French your project will use all the rules defined for all the language chain in the correct order.
注：具有匹配语言模式的所有分割规则集按给定顺序应用。 因此，例如，加拿大法语（FR-CA）的规则应当高于法语（FR.*）规则，而后者又高于默认（.*）规则。这样，当从加拿大法语进行翻译时，你的项目就会按照正确顺序应用整个语言链条上所定义的所有规则。

Note: DocBook files are recognized not only by file extension, but they also must have a DOCTYPE declaration: <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML... for DocBook 4, or a Namespace: xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" for DocBook 5
注：DocBook 文件并不仅根据文件扩展名识别，对于 DocBook 4 还需要有 DOCTYPE 声明：<!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML...，而对于 DocBook 5 则需要有命名空间：xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook"

OmegaT has detected a 3.6-style team project.
Press 'OK' to convert the project into a 4.x-style team project. This will delete your local data and re-download the project contents from the server.
Press 'Cancel' to leave the project unmodified and load it as a local project without team functionality. (You will still able to use OmegaT 3.6 to edit this project as a team project.)

按“取消”将保持项目不变，并将其作为没有团队功能的本地项目加载。 （你依然可以用 OmegaT 3.6 来将此项目作为团队项目编辑。）

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.
OmegaT 是自由且开源的多平台计算机辅助翻译工具，具有模糊匹配、翻译记忆、 关键字查找、词汇表、以及为更新后的项目自动套用翻译等特性。

OmegaT is capable of handling the current Microsoft Office formats directly, without conversion to or from other formats.

OmegaT is refused access to the system property containing the name of your OS and/or the system property containing your home folder. Therefore, the location of OmegaT's configuration folder cannot be reliably determined. The current folder will be used instead. As a result of this, all settings will be at their defaults, due to which you may experience unexpected, but correct behaviour.
OmegaT 无法访问包含操作系统名称的系统属性和/或 包含你的主文件夹的系统属性。因此，无法可靠地确定 OmegaT 的配置文件夹位置。将改用当前文件夹。 这样的结果是所有设置都将处于其默认值，因此你可能 会遇到意外但正确的行为。

Scope: The scope of a search is by default the project and can be set to be any files located in a specified folder hierarchy. Project searches are by default performed on the source and target, reference TMs, glossaries, notes and comments of the project.
Types: Exact searches match the whole search string. Keyword searches match all the space-separated keywords regardless of their order. Regular expression searches match Java regular expressions as documented in the user manual.
Wildcards: Both exact and keyword searches support the wildcard characters * and ?. '*' matches zero or more characters ('run*' matches 'run', 'runs', and'running', etc.) '?' matches exactly one character ('run?' matches 'runs' and 'rung', but not 'run' or 'running').
Text Replace: The scope of a text replacement is the target segments of the project, whether they already have contents or not. Keyword searches are not available in the search string. When using regular expressions, the replacement string supports references to groups defined in the search string. Use $n to refer to the nth group.

范围： 默认情况下，查找范围是整个项目，但可以设置为位于指定文件夹层次结构中的所有文件。 默认情况下，项目查找是在项目的原文、译文、参考翻译记忆库、词汇表、备注、和注释中进行的。
类型： 精确查找完全匹配整个查找字符串。 关键字查找会匹配以空格分隔的所有关键字，无视顺序。 正则表达式查找则以用户手册中所记载的 Java 正则表达式来进行匹配。
通配符： 精确查找和关键字查找都支持通配符 * 和 ?。 “*” 匹配零个或若干个字符（“run*”匹配“run”、“runs”、和“running”，等等） “?” 匹配单个字符（“run?”匹配“runs”和“rung”，但不匹配“run”或“running”）。
文本替换： 文本替换的范围是项目的译文片段，无论这些片段是否已经有了译文。 在查找字符串中关键字查找不可用。 当使用正则表达式时，替换字符串支持引用查找字符串中所定义的组。用 $n 来引用第 n 个组。

These translation memories can be very useful when a document that has already been translated needs to be updated. Unchanged sentences are automatically translated, while updated sentences are shown with the translation of the most similar, older sentence. Modifications to the original document are thus handled with greater ease. If you are supplied with previously created translation memories , for example by your translation agency or your client, OmegaT is able to use these as reference memories.
如果您需要对已译文档进行更新，这些译法记忆可以有效提高效率。文本中未发生变化的句子会进行自动翻译，而更新后的句子则会提供最相似的原有句段的译文以供参考。这样，您可以轻松处理原文档中更新变化后的部分。如果您手头有事先创建好的译法记忆文件，比如说是翻译公司或客户提供给您的译法记忆，OmegaT 也可以使用这些文件作为翻译参考。

Usage: java -jar OmegaT.jar [<options>] [<project path>]
Options: None: Launch GUI Project path only: Launch GUI and load specified project team Team project tool. Invoke `team -h` for details. -h, --help Show usage information. --remote-project Download an omegat.project file from the URL given as <project path> and load the project. --mode=[console-translate|console-pseudotranslatetmx|console-align] Specify a mode other than default (GUI). See below for details. --config-file=<path> A Java .properties file from which to load default settings. --resource-bundle=<path> A Java .properties file to use for interface text --config-dir=<path> The directory to read/write OmegaT configuration files from/to. --disable-project-locking Do not attempt to lock the project's omegat.project file. --disable-location-save Do not remember the last directory opened in the file picker. --no-team Disable team project functionality. --ITokenizer=<classname> --ITokenizerTarget=<classname> Source- or target-language tokenizer to use (overrides project settings). See OmegaT.jar/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF for valid values.
Non-GUI mode options: --quiet Reduce output to command line stdout. --script=<path> A script file to be executed on project events. --tag-validation=[abort|warn] Validate tags. Abort: Exit with an error if tags invalid. Warn: Report invalid tags to stdout.
Console-translate mode: --source-pattern=<pattern> A regex whitelist of source files to process.
Console-pseudotranslatetmx mode: --pseudotranslatetmx=<path> The output pseudotranslated TMX file. --pseudotranslatetype=[equal|empty] What to fill the pseudotranslated TMX with.
Console-align mode: --alignDir=<path> A directory containing the translated files.
See Help > User's Manual for more information.

用法：java -jar OmegaT.jar [<选项>] [<项目路径>]
选项： 无：启动图形界面 仅有项目路径：启动图形界面并载入指定项目 team 团队项目工具。有关详细信息，请调用 `team -h`。 -h, --help 显示用法信息。 --remote-project 从作为<项目路径>给出的网址下载 omegat.project 文件并载入此项目。 --mode=[console-translate|console-pseudotranslatetmx|console-align] 指定默认模式（图形界面）之外的其他模式。请参阅下文了解详情。 --config-file=<path> 用于加载默认设置的 Java .properties 文件。 --resource-bundle=<path> 用于界面文本的 Java .properties 文件 --config-dir=<path> 用于读取/写入 OmegaT 配置文件的目录。 --disable-project-locking 不要尝试锁定项目的 omegat.project 文件。 --disable-location-save 不要记忆最后一次在文件选择器中打开的目录。 --no-team 禁用团队项目功能。 --ITokenizer=<类名> --ITokenizerTarget=<类名> 原文语言或译文语言所使用的分词器（会覆盖项目设置）。有关所有有效的值，参见 OmegaT.jar/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF。
非图形界面模式选项： --quiet 减少输出到命令行 stdout 的输出量。 --script=<path> 在项目事件时执行的脚本文件。 --tag-validation=[abort|warn] 校验标签。Abort：当标签无效时退出并显示错误。 Warn：将无效的标签记录到 stdout。
Console-translate 模式: --source-pattern=<模式> 要处理的原文文件的正则表达式白名单。
Console-pseudotranslatetmx 模式: --pseudotranslatetmx=<path> 输出伪翻译的 TMX 文件。 --pseudotranslatetype=[equal|empty] 用什么来填充伪翻译的 TMX。
Console-align 模式: --alignDir=<path> 包含译文文件的目录。
更多信息，参见 帮助 > 用户手册。
